item.title: 2012 blog statistics overview
item.description: As the year 2012 is almost over, I like to thank everyone for supporting my blog! It was a good year. Google Analytics collected in 2012 the following statistics: 217,650 visitors 159,187 unique visitors 345,650 pageviews The busiest day was on march 1, 2494 visitors The most visitors came from the United States, followed by Germany, United Kingdom and The Netherlands Average page visit duration was 01 minute and 21 seconds The top browsers used are: Firebox (32%) followed by Internet Explorer (30%) and Chrome (28%) The top Operating Systems used are: Windows (85%), Macintosh (14%) and Linux (4%) I wish everyone a happy, healthy and great 2013!
